Verb *press*
*************

Documentation for the press verb in */cmds/verbs/press.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``press <something>``
 |  ``press <something> <in some way>``
 |  ``press <something> with <something>``

 Press or push a button, push it hard, press the flowers with the books.
